text: Hà Đức Chinh (born September 22, 1997) is a Vietnamese professional footballer who plays as a forward for SHB Đà Nẵng and the Vietnam national team.https://www.fifa.com/fifa-tournaments/players- coaches/people=403375/index.html ==Honours== ===International=== Vietnam U23 *AFC U-23 Championship : Runners-up : : 2018 Vietnam Olympic *Asian Games Fourth place: 2018 Vietnam U22 *SEA Games: : Winners : 2019 == International goals == ===U-20=== :Scores and results list Vietnam's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" ! # !!
